indicators.title: Average Household Size By Area
indicators.description: The average number of people living in a household, broken down by geographic area.

indicators.title: Birth Rate
indicators.description: The number of live births per 1,000 population.

indicators.title: Death Rate
indicators.description: The number of deaths per 1,000 population.

indicators.title: Male to Female Ratio
indicators.description: The ratio of males to females in a population.

indicators.title: Maternal Mortality Ratio
indicators.description: The number of maternal deaths per 100,000 live births.

indicators.title: Population Distribution by Broad Age Group
indicators.description: The distribution of a population by age group.

indicators.title: Population Pyramid
indicators.description: A graphical representation of the distribution of a population by age and gender.

indicators.title: Single Age Population
indicators.description: The number of people in a population by single age.

indicators.title: Average Interview Time
indicators.description: The average length of time it takes to conduct an interview.

indicators.title: Estimated Number of Days Left
indicators.description: The estimated number of days left in a project.

indicators.title: Partially Completed Cases
indicators.description: The number of cases that have been partially completed.

indicators.title: Households Enumerated Against Target
indicators.description: The number of households that have been enumerated, compared to the target number of households.

indicators.title: Households Enumerated Against Target by Day
indicators.description: The number of households that have been enumerated each day, compared to the target number of households.

indicators.title: Households Enumerated by Day (Cumulative)
indicators.description: The cumulative number of households that have been enumerated each day.

indicators.title: Percentage of Household Enumerated Against Target
indicators.description: The percentage of households that have been enumerated, compared to the target number of households.

indicators.title: Percentage of Population Enumerated Against Target
indicators.description: The percentage of the population that has been enumerated, compared to the target number of population.

indicators.title: Population Enumerated Against Target
indicators.description: The number of people in the population that have been enumerated, compared to the target number of population.

indicators.title: Population Enumerated by Day
indicators.description: The number of people in the population that have been enumerated each day.

indicators.title: Population Enumerated by Day (Cumulative)
indicators.description: The cumulative number of people in the population that have been enumerated each day.
